item.title: Technical Consultant for the Ocean Census Biodiversity Data Platform
item.description:
Fenris partnered with the Intertidal Agency to provide technical consulting support for the Ocean Census Biodiversity Data Platform, a critical component of the world’s largest collaborative effort to accelerate the discovery of marine life. We provided strategic guidance during a pivotal phase of this multi-year initiative.

The Ocean Census, launched by The Nippon Foundation and Nekton, is the world’s largest collaborative effort to accelerate the discovery of marine life, endorsed under the United Nations Ocean Decade. The initiative brings together governments, philanthropic supporters, and leading marine research organizations to discover and document an estimated 1-2 million undiscovered marine species before they potentially go extinct.
